title: FS: 1911 Wanamaker Home Run Baker SOLD
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 Wanamaker Home Run Baker SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very rare postcard produced for the 1911 World Series where Frank Baker earned his famous nickname.

SOLD

*REA sold an unused one for [URL="https://robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2016/fall/680/extremely-rare-1911-wanamaker-world-series-souvenir-postcard-frank-baker/"]$1560[/URL] a few years ago

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/baseball/ruthphotoresearch/websize/lf%20_1__2.jpeg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/baseball/ruthphotoresearch/websize/lf%20_4__2.jpeg[/IMG]
bump for price reduction, extremely rare card...
